name: Candy Fever - Pop Sweet
description:
Sprinkled with a deliciously sweet twist, this game keeps your mind sharp and have fun playing with beautiful and colorful candy bubble. Connect the tasty candy in a line on the farm field to create explosive combos to crush them in 200+ levels, each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges for you to rescue! With an emphasis on high scores and quick combos, Candy Fever is a must-have on mobile. Now follow the instructions and whip your way though tons of challenges by concocting scrumptious combos!

Game Features:
- Stunning visuals, relaxing game music and innovative controls
- Dazzling backgrounds as you solve puzzles at amazing paces with your pet companion!
- Unlock more heroes as you go - unique witch craft designed for each hero
- Fun and easy to play, but a rewarding challenge to master
